Html:
Hi,

where can i find information about the changes that had been done to the development version under "Source Code".

Thx.

Freibeuter
Check the file "changelog.txt" in each development version.

There i can find only the changes for each stable version and what has been plannend.
But what has changed e.g. in build 10762?

Freibeuter

You can compare the changelog with a previous one, but thats all there is.
Also, you can subscribe to the issue list RSS feed and see what has been closed each time.
